attributes.action: Ban the manufacturing and sale of cot bumpers illegal.
attributes.additional_details:
Lullabytrust: 
https://www.lullabytrust.org.uk/parents-should-remove-cot-bumpers/

Prestons story: 
https://kidsindanger.org/family-voices/preston/

Stores such as mothercare are still selling these death traps, and with the incorrect sleeping advise to go with it. They are using SIDS as a way to scare parents into buying their products, this is not ok. Using the term co-sleeping to describe bed sharing when co-sleeping is sharing a room with baby which is thought to reduce SIDS.
attributes.background: Cot bumpers are a piece of material made to tie around the head of a infants bed, this supposedly protects them. Cot bumpers are available from stores such as mothercare and M&P. They have been a reason infants have lost their lives either from suffocation or strangulation. Please help stop this.
